allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Local SEO critical fixes: H1 tags, Google Maps, phone schema

- Fix homepage H1 \(was h2 with mismatched closing tag\) with local keywords
- Add embedded Google Maps iframe to contact page for local trust signals
- Add mobile phone number \(+447971331814\) to LocalBusiness and ContactPoint schemas
- Improve About page H1 and title with local keywords
- Add Review schema to contact page for rich snippets
- Enhance contact page meta title with phone number for click-to-call

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Stop-Process -Name ChilternCleaner -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; & ''C:\\Program Files\\dotnet\\dotnet.exe'' build ''C:\\Users\\Dave\\chiltern-cleaner\\ChilternCleaner\\ChilternCleaner.csproj'' 2>&1 | Select-Object -Last 5")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d C:\\Users\\Dave\\chiltern-cleaner && dotnet new console -n IconConverter -o IconConverter --force")
